name: In re ESTATE of Domenick L. MARCHIO, Deceased. Appeal of Leona M. SAVAGE

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: In re ESTATE of Domenick L. MARCHIO, Deceased. Appeal of Leona M. SAVAGE.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Decree of the Court of Common Pleas of Allegheny County is affirmed. Each party is to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Michael J. Boyle, Meyer, Unkovic & Scott, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Anthony P. Picadio, Tucker, Arensberg, Very & Ferguson, Pittsburgh, for Estate.
casebody.head_matter:
421 A.2d 212
In re ESTATE of Domenick L. MARCHIO, Deceased. Appeal of Leona M. SAVAGE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 30, 1980.
Decided Nov. 3, 1980.
Michael J. Boyle, Meyer, Unkovic & Scott, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Anthony P. Picadio, Tucker, Arensberg, Very & Ferguson, Pittsburgh, for Estate.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
